sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import './styles.css' import { CreateProducts } from '../products' import products from '../productslist' function ProductInfo() { let selectedProduct = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("selectedProduct")) const [bagItems, setBagItem] = useState([]) function setBagItems(e) { for(let i = 0; i < products.length; i++) { if (e.target.alt === products[i].alt) { bagItems.push(products[i]) sessionStorage.setItem("selectedProduct", JSON.stringify(selectedProduct)) navigate('../productinfo/scripts'); } } } return <>
{(selectedProduct)[0].name}
{(selectedProduct)[0].snippet}
{(selectedProduct)[0].price}
{(selectedProduct)[0].description}
Recommended for you:
} export default ProductInfo
